title: Validus Gaming: Looking for a Bronze or Silver adc, mid, and support
body: We are looking for people to fill out a team 2. Both teams will scrim in practices and climb the league ladder. We are a supportive, crazy, and fun group of people looking for like minded people to climb up the ladder. Please contact either myself ReaperOfSouls16 or PyrextheProdigy. We will ask you a few questions, try you out, and will get back to you with our finial decisions. Duo bot lanes would be nice but not necessary :) .

replies.body: I play adc, have most champs and have good mechanics
hello I am interested please add me ingame thanks!
Tryouts are over for today if still interested find me tomorrow after 5pm-6pm eastern time
main support but also very very very comfortable adc
i could adc for you guys
We would like a midlaner to tryout. We will start tryouts once this happens

Seems like you need a mindless dummy to take your hits and laugh at to bolster the main teams morale.

me numero uno for job position
I'm in. I'll go anywhere u would like me to go :)
